Container.Name: myVaillant2mqtt
Container.Overview: Requests system states from myVaillant and publishes it to an MQTT broker every five minutes.
Container.Description: Requests system states from myVaillant and publishes it to an MQTT broker every five minutes.

Config.Name: username
Config.Description: myVaillant username needed to login to myVaillant

Config.Name: password
Config.Description: myVaillant password needed to login to myVaillant

Config.Name: country
Config.Description: The country you registered your myVAILLANT account in. The list of options is limited to known supported countries. https://signalkraft.com/mypyllant-component/#supported-brands-countries

Config.Name: MQTT broker host
Config.Description: MQTT Broker IP or DNS Name

Config.Name: MQTT username
Config.Description: MQTT username to connect with broker

Config.Name: MQTT password
Config.Description: MQTT password to connect with broker

Config.Name: MQTT topic
Config.Description: MQTT topic to push state to

Config.Name: MQTT enable ssl
Config.Description: MQTT switch to enable ssl and cert verification light

Config.Name: MQTT fingerprint of trusted cert
Config.Description: MQTT hash of certificate of trusted server. If unsure about the correct value, enable MQTT_USE_SSL and let MQTT_TRUSTED_FINGERPRINT empty. Start the container and have a look into container log.
